states.label: Redline
states.description: High acute stress; survival mode; minimal cognitive bandwidth.

states.label: Autopilot
states.description: You can function, but you're disconnected, flat, or running on fumes.

states.label: Looping
states.description: Racing thoughts; rumination; indecision; can't land the plane.

states.label: Build Mode
states.description: Enough stability to reflect, plan, and take consistent action.
